text: Trump Suggests Musk Effort at Treasury Found Irregularities  — There could be a problem with Treasuries, Trump says  — Trump made comments amid DOGE scrutiny of government payments  —  President Donald Trump suggested that Elon Musk's government efficiency team has found irregularities …

Trump says US may have less debt than thought because of fraud  —  U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday said the United States may carry less debt than thought and said it could be because of fraud related to debt payments.  —  Trump made his comments to reporters aboard Air Force One while flying to the Super Bowl in New Orleans.

Trump Plans to Impose 25% Tariffs on Steel, Aluminum Imports  — Duties to apply to imports from all countries, president says  — President to announce reciprocal tariffs in coming days  —  Trade wars, tariff threats and logistics shocks are upending businesses and spreading volatility.

Vance and Musk question the authority of the courts as Trump's agenda faces legal pushback  —  Top Trump administration officials are openly questioning the judiciary's authority to serve as a check on executive power as the new president's sweeping agenda faces growing pushback from the courts.

Trump Orders Treasury Secretary to Stop Minting Pennies  —  President Trump said that the coins cost more to produce than their face value.  —  President Trump said on Sunday night that he had ordered the Treasury secretary to stop producing new pennies, a move that he said would help reduce unnecessary government spending.

Trump says he has directed U.S. Treasury to stop minting new pennies, citing rising cost  —  The U.S. Mint reported losing $85.3 million in the 2024 fiscal year, which ended in September, on the nearly 3.2 billion pennies it produced.  —  / Source: The Associated Press
